definitions.definition: a large room used for formal or public events.
examples: room, hall, assembly room, auditorium a debating chamber

definitions.definition: any of the houses of a legislature.
a private room, typically a bedroom.
examples: he had his meals brought to his chamber
synonyms: room; Moreliterarybower; historicalboudoir; archaicbedchamber "we slept safely in our chamber"

definitions.definition: a judge's room used for official proceedings not required to be held in open court.
rooms used by a lawyer or lawyers.
the part of a gun bore that contains the charge or bullet.
a cavity in a plant, animal body, or organ.
examples: the four chambers of the heart
synonyms: ventricle "the left chamber of the heart"

definitions.definition: of or for a small group of instruments.
place (a bullet) into the chamber of a gun.
